public class %plugName% extends JavaPlugin {

    %cacheStatic%
    %databaseStatic%
    %configurationStatic%
	%vaultStatic%

    public void onEnable() {

        %configurationInstance%
        %cacheInstance%
        %databaseInstance%
		%vaultInstance%
        
        /* 
        * Registered MyPlayerListener and give it the plugin relation
        */
        getServer().getPluginManager().registerEvents(new MyPlayerListener(this), this);

    }


    public void onDisable() {
        
        // Set all static variable to null
        %cacheStaticStop%
        %databaseStaticStop%
        %configurationStaticStop%
		%vaultStaticStop%

    }


    %loadConfig%


}
